name: Return to Roanoke
description:
Return to Roanoke is a short horror game loosely based on the mystery of the Roanoke village. 

The people of the village have been forced out of their home by this monster that is stalking and haunting them. You play as a village citizen who has gone back after everybody has started on the migration to recover certain items that your neighbors have left behind. Collect all the items and escape before Deerman can get to you, he could be lurking around any corner....
